intro: I'm a developer from Vietnamese passionate about technology and knowledge sharing. This blog serves two purposes: sharing what I know and improving my own skills.
contentTypes: You'll find three types of content here: blog posts, TILs (Today I Learned), and notes. Notes help me internalize new concepts, TILs capture quick learning moments that don't warrant full posts, and blog posts are well-researched, carefully crafted pieces about topics I've deeply explored.
closing: I hope you find something useful here. If you have any questions or feedback, feel free to reach out!
